articles.title: CoreWeave Stock Soars on $14 Billion Meta Deal -- Wall Street Says the Nvidia-Backed AI Stock Is Still a Buy
articles.content: CoreWeave, an AI cloud services provider, secured a $14.2 billion computing power deal with Meta Platforms through 2031. The company has shown remarkable growth, with 207% revenue increase and strong performance in AI infrastructure, backed by Nvidia and attracting major tech customers.
articles.author: Trevor Jennewine

articles.title: Meta To Acquire Rivos To Power AI Ambitions: Report
articles.content: Meta Platforms is exploring the acquisition of chip startup Rivos to accelerate its semiconductor and AI infrastructure capabilities, aiming to reduce reliance on external GPU providers and enhance its AI development efforts.
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri

articles.title: Nvidia, Meta Thriving On 'Middle-Class Rip-Off' As Power Costs Spiral 267% Amid AI Boom: Larry McDonald
articles.content: Tech giants like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Meta are experiencing significant growth in AI, driven by massive electricity consumption in data centers, which is causing power costs to rise dramatically and potentially burdening middle-class consumers.
articles.author: Erica Kollmann

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Snap Declines on Neutral Analyst Outlook
articles.content: Snap Inc. experienced a sharp decline of 8.21% after receiving a Neutral rating from Mizuho, with concerns about weak advertising channels and mixed recovery signals. Other social media stocks like Meta and Reddit also saw declines.
articles.author: Daily Stock News

articles.title: CoreWeave Deepens AI Moat With $14.2B Meta Deal After OpenAI Expansion
articles.content: CoreWeave secured a $14.2 billion AI infrastructure deal with Meta Platforms, following a recent $6.5 billion expansion with OpenAI. The company continues to strengthen its position as a critical AI infrastructure provider, diversifying its client base and demonstrating strong investor confidence.
articles.author: Timothy Fries

articles.title: 3 Reasons Why Oracle's Cloud Computing Deals With Meta Platforms and OpenAI Make The "Ten Titans" Growth Stock a Top Buy Now
articles.content: Oracle is positioning itself as a leading cloud computing and AI infrastructure provider through strategic partnerships with Meta Platforms and OpenAI, leveraging custom-built data centers and multicloud capabilities to drive significant growth in cloud infrastructure revenue.
articles.author: Daniel Foelber

articles.title: Verizon to be the first carrier to offer the new AI-powered Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses
articles.content: Verizon will be the first wireless carrier to offer Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses, featuring a high-resolution in-lens display, AI-powered features, and intuitive hand gesture controls for enhanced connectivity and interaction.
articles.author: George Koroneos
